body_html:
I believe it was because we needed to do a copy and set the data type instead of just copying. I suppose we could have done a safe copy and then used set_dtype as an alternative though.

body:
I believe it was because we needed to do a copy and set the data type
instead of just copying. I suppose we could have done a safe copy and then
used set_dtype as an alternative though.
